**Government Tender Announcement**
### Camera & Alarm Wiring Upgrades for RCMP Hay River Detachment

#### Solicitation Details

* Reference Number: PW-23-01022284
* Solicitation Number: M5000-23-01552/A
* Publication Date: January 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2023 3:00 PM
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Project Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to upgrade cabling for Closed Circuit Video Equipment (CCVE) and Intrusion Detection System (IDS) systems at the RCMP detachment in Hay River, Northwest Territories. This project will enhance security and monitoring capabilities at the detachment.

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Construction and Services
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Northwest Territories
* Regions of Delivery: Northwest Territories

#### Requirements and Evaluation

* The contractor must hold a valid Facility Access Level 2 (FA-2) with Escort Security Clearance issued by RCMP Departmental Security.
* Evaluation procedures: bids will be assessed based on the entire requirement of the bid solicitation.
* A bid must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Mandatory Requirements

* Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) registration: suppliers must certify that they are an Indigenous business and comply with all requirements of the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

#### Contracting Entity

* Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* Address: 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2

#### Contact Information

* Shawn Balaski, Contracting Officer
* Email: shawn.m.balaski@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: 780-670-8592
